title: Kylie Jenner in fender bender as driver crashes on the way to party
text:
Kylie Jenner’s car was involved in an accident (Picture: Instagram/Backgrid)

Kylie Jenner was involved in a fender bender over the weekend after her driver managed to crash his car into another while dropping Kylie and a friend to Demi Lovato’s Halloween party.

The lip kit and make up mogul, 22, had chosen an epic couples costume with her friend Anastasia Karanikolaou as Madonna and Britney Spears from the MTV VMAs in 2003.

The pair showed off their incredible costumes on Instagram, even recreating that famous on-stage kiss, but the fender bender put a bit of a dampener on their night and they ended up not going to Demi’s party after all.

While the crash itself didn’t look too serious – just a small scratch along the bumper of their cab as it tried to squeeze past another car – it seems like Kylie wasn’t in the party mood after that.

Advertisement

Advertisement

The crash was apparently witnessed by several of the partygoers as Kylie sat in the back of the car looking worried.

Demi, on the other hand, was more than ready to party with her other celeb pals at Hyde in Hollywood, dressing up as a far hotter version of Pennywise the clown from It.

Kylie hid in the back seat as her driver pranged the car (Picture: BACKGRID)

The car was left with a scrape on the bumper (Picture: BACKGRID)

Paris Hilton turned up for the bash dressed in the classic and obviously absolutely terrifying Halloween costume of a schoolgirl.

It was the second party of the weekend for Demi, who had also donned an elaborate costume and sky-high wig to channel Marie Antoinette for another party on Friday night.

She told her followers: ‘Halloween round 1… I told y’all I don’t play on Halloween!! It’s my time to shine, glam team killed it’.

There’s still a few more days until Halloween so there’s still time for Demi and Kylie to bust out some even more amazing costumes until then.

MORE: Kylie Jenner ‘stronger and more independent’ after pregnancy as she shares sweet throwback
description: Kylie Jenner ended up bailing on Demi Lovato's Halloween party after her driver got into a crash on the way there.
